Component ID.description: The unique ID of the component

Sample ID.description: The ID of the sample to which the component belongs (linked to Sample)

Layer ID.description: The ID of the layer to which the component belongs (linked to Layer)

Component number.description: The component number, in the format C1, C2, etc.

Parent Component ID.description: The ID of the parent component, if the component is nested within another

Component size.description: The size of the component particles

Component colour descriptor.description: The color descriptor of the component

confidence.description: The confidence level of the component identification

material.description: The material composition of the component

Component composition.description: The composition of the component (confidence level and material)

confidence.description: The confidence level of the component type identification

type.description: The type or function of the component

Component type.description: The interpretation of the component's function (confidence level and type)

Analytical method.description: An array of analytical methods used to analyze the component

Analytical protocol name.description: The ID of the analytical protocol used (linked to Protocol)

Date of analysis.description: The date the analysis was carried out (format: YYYY/MM/DD)

Analysis carried out by.description: The ID of the person who carried out the analysis (linked to Person)

Component comment.description: Additional comments or notes about the component
